channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SEO Redirection Plugin - 301 Redirect Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- SEO Redirection Plugin - 301 Redirect Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-24187|2024-08-03T19:21:18.704Z -- unknown -- seo%20redirection%20plugin%20-%20301%20redirect%20manager
item.description: The setting page of the SEO Redirection Plugin - 301 Redirect Manager WordPress plugin before 6.4 is vulnerable to reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) as user input is not properly sanitised before being output in an attribute.
